channel.title: [508] RS Replication [508]
channel.description:
[i][b]RS Replication[/b][/i]
[b]Information[/b] RS Replication is based off of SB508 (created by Luigi from r-s), based off of palidino76's base. The goal of this project is to remake the essential parts of Runescape, and then release the source. I'm not going to put this online or anything, I just want to release a good base to the public. I will also not bother myself with getting every single detail to be exactly like it was in Runescape.
[b]Recent Updates[/b] [code]- HD loading added - Fishing added (able to small net fish, harpoon fish, fly fish, and bait fish)[/code]
[b]Pictures[/b] [spoiler][img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/5081_zps1652892f.png[/img] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/5082_zps245f0d15.png[/img][/spoiler]

item.title: [508] RS Replication [508]
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Michael P, post:9, topic:544391”][quote author=Limits link=topic=663271.msg4432775#msg4432775 date=1404016691]
Any of you guys want to send me a link to a 530 or 525 client with HD working on macs? That would make my day. Because I was trying to get it working for ages.
[/quote]

Right here. http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/492138-scapeemulator.html[/quote]

I’m not doing that “point my browser” stuff. I prefer having the actual client files and the cache.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] RS Replication [508]
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:5, topic:544391”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=663271.msg4432768#msg4432768 date=1404014802]

HD loading isn’t anything to be proud of until you get it working on Linux and Mac.
[/quote]… all you do for that is add the correct jogl binaries to the cache folder and it will work properly

That’s what you think, I’ve done all that and more and nothing has changed.[/quote]

David is correct, all you need is the correct jogl for the OS. Lol

Read full topic

item.title: [508] RS Replication [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:5, topic:544391”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=663271.msg4432768#msg4432768 date=1404014802]

HD loading isn’t anything to be proud of until you get it working on Linux and Mac.
[/quote]… all you do for that is add the correct jogl binaries to the cache folder and it will work properly

That’s what you think, I’ve done all that and more and nothing has changed.[/quote]You probably put them in the wrong place, used the wrong binaries, or the client is modified to download the cache to a place that isn’t in the normal locations. I remember getting it to work on linux by adding the binaries.

Read full topic

item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

RS Replication

Information
RS Replication is based off of SB508 (created by Luigi from r-s), based off of palidino76’s base. The goal of this project is to remake the essential parts of Runescape, and then release the source. I’m not going to put this online or anything, I just want to release a good base to the public. I will also not bother myself with getting every single detail to be exactly like it was in Runescape.

Recent Updates

[code]- HD loading added

  • Fishing added (able to small net fish, harpoon fish, fly fish, and bait fish)[/code]
